title: Country line dancing
brief_description: Country Line Dancing, or Bootscooting, made easy for everyone. Instructor Diane Horner of “Cowboy” in Minneapolis Minnesota demonstrates the 40 basic dance steps used in line dancing. Dances demonstrated include Electric Slide, Country Strut, Southside Shuffle, Cowboy Cha Cha, Achy Breaky, Slap Leather, Tush Push and the circle dance, Cotton Eyed Joe, plus the special bonus, Sixteen Step. The first 30 minute part is followed by more complex instructions.
